summary: Deftones, an American alternative metal band from Sacramento, California, was formed in 1988 by Chino Moreno, Stephen Carpenter, and Abe Cunningham. They gained popularity with their albums "Adrenaline" (1995), "Around the Fur" (1997), and "White Pony" (2000), which won a Grammy for the song "Elite." The band experimented with their sound over time and faced challenges with bassist Chi Cheng's accident and later death. Despite lineup changes, Deftones continued to release successful albums like "Diamond Eyes" (2010) and "Ohms" (2020), earning critical acclaim for their unique style.
title: Deftones
